content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Hand it Over Unless you succeed at a Reflex saving throw, your target gains possessions of your weapon.

Melee
Broken Your weapon's current Hit Points are reduced to its Broken Threshold. If already broken, the weapon takes 3d6 damage, ignoring Hardness.

Ranged
Smash the Floor You kick up a cloud of dust, becoming blinded until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
You made 'em Faster The target is quickened for 2 rounds.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #44
